name: slack-integration
description: Interact with Slack workspaces via the Slack API. Send messages, manage channels, list messages, add reactions, and invite users. Uses injected provider client for API access (BYOK).
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: slack_integration
toolDefinition.description: Interact with Slack workspaces: send messages, list/get/create channels, list messages, add reactions, invite users, and set channel topics. Layer 1 skill using injected provider client for Slack API access.

action.description: send_message (post to channel), list_channels (workspace channels), get_channel (channel info), list_messages (channel history), react (add emoji reaction), create_channel (new channel), invite_user (invite to channel), set_topic (set channel topic)

channel.description: Channel ID or name. Required for send_message, get_channel, list_messages, react, invite_user, set_topic.

text.description: Message text to send (required for send_message).

threadTs.description: Thread timestamp for replying in a thread (send_message).

type.description: Channel type filter for list_channels (default: public).

limit.description: Number of results to return (default varies by action).

oldest.description: Start of time range for list_messages (Unix timestamp).

latest.description: End of time range for list_messages (Unix timestamp).

timestamp.description: Message timestamp for react action (required for react).

emoji.description: Emoji name without colons for react action (required for react).

name.description: Channel name for create_channel (required for create_channel).

isPrivate.description: Whether to create a private channel (default: false).

user.description: User ID to invite (required for invite_user).
